sqlMap.select: SELECT concat(a.task_code, '---', a.seq) pic_type, s.cnt s_cnt, a.cnt a_cnt, s.cnt / a.cnt s_rate FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt, handle_client client_id, task_code, seq FROM tb_captcha cpout join tb_client_task ct on cpout.task_id=ct.id WHERE cpout.expire_time between #begin# and #end# AND handle_client=#clientId# GROUP BY handle_client, task_code, seq) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) cnt, handle_client client_id, cpmaxid.task_code, cpmaxid.seq FROM tb_captcha cpout, (SELECT MAX(cp.id) AS id, max(cl.task_code) AS task_code, cp.seq AS seq FROM tb_captcha cp, tb_client_task_log cl WHERE cp.task_id = cl.task_id AND cl.task_code IN ('registerRobotUserEmail','registerWeibo') AND cl.status = 0 AND cl.executed_time between #begin# and #end# GROUP BY cp.task_id, cp.seq) cpmaxid WHERE cpmaxid.id = cpout.id AND handle_client=#clientId# GROUP BY handle_client, cpmaxid.task_code, cpmaxid.seq) s ON a.client_id = s.client_id and a.task_code=s.task_code and a.seq=s.seq ORDER BY a.task_code,a.seq ASC
